thread.title: Toshiba to post annual net loss of about 10 billion yen: Yomiuri
thread.title_full: Toshiba to post annual net loss of about 10 billion yen: Yomiuri

author: Expert
title: Toshiba to post annual net loss of about 10 billion yen: Yomiuri
text:
Business News businessNews Expert 
TOKYO (Reuters) – Japan’s Toshiba Corp is likely to post a net loss of about 10 billion yen ($83 million) when it reports its financial 2014/15 earnings as early as this week, the Yomiuri daily reported, amid a probe into improper accounting at the company.
